usefulItems: soufflé or brioche pans (approx. 4 in.), oven
title: Zucchini and Cheese Soufflés

ingredients.content: ½ oz oil, plus extra to grease
3 oz Parmesan cheese, cut into pieces (approx. ¾ in.)
3 ½ oz white onions, quartered (approx. ½ large onion)
10 ½ oz zucchini, peeled, cut into pieces (approx. 2 in.) (approx. 1½ medium zucchini)
2 ½ oz raclette cheese, cut into 8 equal pieces

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 425°F. Grease soufflé or brioche pans.
Place Parmesan cheese into mixing bowl and grate <b>15 sec/speed 7<b>. Transfer into a bowl and set aside.
Place onions and garlic into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add oil and without measuring cup sauté <b>5 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>.
Add zucchini and salt, insert measuring cup and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>.
Add reserved grated Parmesan cheese, milk, flour and eggs and blend <b>10 sec/speed 3.5<b>.
Half-fill prepared dishes, adding a wedge of raclette cheese before topping with remaining mixture. Bake for 25 minutes (425°F) until lightly browned.
Allow to cool slightly before removing from soufflé dishes. Serve hot.

hintsAndTricks: Replace raclette cheese with any type of blue cheese, Manchego cheese or easy-to-melt processed cheese (e.g. Laughing Cow).
